function.name: update_booking
function.description: Updates an existing booking with new information

booking_id.description: ID of the booking to update

service_id.description: ID of the service to change to (optional)

customer_email.description: Updated email address of the customer (optional)

customer_phone.description: Updated contact phone number of the customer (optional)

booking_date.description: Updated date for the booking in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional)

booking_time.description: Updated time for the booking in HH:MM format (24-hour) (optional)

notes.description: Updated notes or special requests for the booking (optional)
